com.relteq.sirius.simulator
Class _Scenario

java.lang.Object
  com.relteq.sirius.jaxb.Scenario
      com.relteq.sirius.simulator._Scenario

public final class _Scenario
extends com.relteq.sirius.jaxb.Scenario

This class provides methods for loading, manipulating, and running scenarios.

A scenario is a collection of,

  • networks (nodes, links, sensors, and signals),
  • network connections,
  • initial conditions,
  • weaving factor profiles,
  • split ratio profiles,
  • downstream boundary conditions,
  • events,
  • controllers,
  • fundamental diagram profiles,
  • path segments,
  • decision points,
  • routes,
  • background demand profiles, and
  • OD demand profiles.
